name: 3-min keto bread

instructionRequests.step: Mix almond flour and paking powder in bread size recipient
Beat it like you are making an omelette

note: I cut the bread horizontally and fill it with cheese, turkey and put it on a frying pan until cheese is melted and bread is more toasted.

imageRequests.description: Keto bread ready in less than three minutes

additionalInfo: Best solution for when you are missing a nice bread. It is super fast to make and you can use you favorite filling. I usually do it for breakfast. Yummy!
